text:
I have configured all the dependencies and have run all the commands but the last command(./gradlew tomcatRunWar) was failing with the exception:
FAILURE: Build failed with an exception. * What went wrong: Execution failed for task ':rat'. > Found 2 files with unapproved/unknown licenses. See file:/Desktop/fineract/build/reports/rat/rat-report.txt

After searching on StackOverflow, I found the fix is to add `failOnError = false` to rat task in build.gradle. But after doing so, this command gets stuck on 92%. :/
task_definition_name: Mifos - FINERACT-632 - Description in Saving Product should not be mandatory

text:
yes, initially ignore that error
run the following commands in the same order

./gradlew rat
./gradlew clean war
./gradlew cleanIdea idea
./gradlew tomcatRunWar

make sure you have configured all dependencies on your OS according to the document: https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/FINERACT/Installing+Fineract-platform


Or you can use eclipse to configure fineract-provider
